ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I may just log in tonight and /ooc Un-nerf the Toys!!!  he he he Musta been the Tunare list that this came up on.  Anyway, when it was first posted the
ygData.messageBody:
Tszaaz wrote:
> Exactly, I am starting a petition to un-nerf the toys. We
> NEED full scale EQ
> toys, if we don't get them I am going to quit to go play AC
> and so will
> everyone else and Verant will go out of business.

I may just log in tonight and /ooc "Un-nerf the Toys!!!" he he he

Musta been the Tunare list that this came up on. Anyway, when it was first
posted the whole thing sounded like a joke, so the fact that they were
supposed to be 8' tall as opposed to 8" tall only made the thread last
longer.

Now that I know this IS real, I'm a bit surprised about the size range. 6"
to 8"? A gnome to an ogre ought to be more of a range than that, nevermind
some of the baddies. Oh well, guess I stick to shooting elastic bands at
those little green army guys. ;^)

Peace
Evulia, bard of Tunare
